name: lifebox
description: 跨平台全能纪录应用 - 基于 Tauri 前端 + Node.js 后端的事件驱动插件系统

scripts.build: cnpm run build --workspace=shared && cnpm run build --workspace=backend && cnpm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.lint: cnpm run lint --workspace=frontend && cnpm run lint --workspace=backend && cnpm run lint --workspace=shared
scripts.lint:fix: cnpm run lint:fix --workspace=frontend && cnpm run lint:fix --workspace=backend && cnpm run lint:fix --workspace=shared
scripts.typecheck: cnpm run typecheck --workspace=frontend && cnpm run typecheck --workspace=backend
scripts.clean: cnpm run clean --workspace=frontend && cnpm run clean --workspace=backend && cnpm run clean --workspace=shared
scripts.install:all: cnpm install && cnpm install --workspace=frontend && cnpm install --workspace=backend && cnpm install --workspace=shared
scripts.precommit: cnpm run lint && cnpm run typecheck && cnpm run test:unit

author: LifeBox Team
